title: CISA and FBI Update Advisory on Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine

sentences: CISA and the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) have updated joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA22-057A: Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine, originally released February 26, 2022. The advisory has been updated to include additional indicators of compromise for WhisperGate and technical details for HermeticWiper, IsaacWiper, HermeticWizard, and CaddyWiper destructive malware.
titles: CISA and FBI Update Advisory on Destructive Malware Targeting Organizations in Ukraine
